Christine

RO.
Is that really true, or are you just saying that is true. Just wanting to work with you in a constructive way so I’d love to confirm what you have said.
Much appreciated!!! Looking forward to cleaning up some of these outstanding issues. Especially the really messy ones we need to partner on.
Thanks Again!

Yes it was just confirmed RO has been filed and restricts communications with text calls email and OFW limited to co parenting related issues. You
can read it in the RO that was signed. .
I intend to adhere to that.
For anything outside parenting issues including financial, household I was informed it should go through counsel. I will send any communications on
these topics to my lawyer and they will send to your lawyer and will try minimize time spent in these issues to limit bills.

recommendation.
I really hate it has come to this... I just had to hang up on AD because I started bawling and so did he. But you can see how we started. How can you
hate me this much? Please talk to AD

I’ll sign off here. Please don’t bother with my last OFW mails. I don’t want it to be that way with us anymore.
You do what you need to do, but I want to separate business from pleasure and quit acting so butt hurt.
Tonight made a big impact on me. I realized that could be our future. Not the nonsense I’m creating.

on your acceptance. And tell the same story.
Let’s not mess with them. And if you really don’t understand what I have explained please ask. If you think im still lying anyway, let’s please don’t
agree, sign the RO and still undercut the story.
Does that sound reasonable?
I’ll watch for alerts. Thank you for doing that. It’s freaking nuts, right???
Next up Bank of America  I’ll explain what they told me and let’s see how to fix.

Message 805 of 4024
Super bummed we came to this after Monday. The giggles and jokes in the elevator seem like yesterday. I honestly thought we had battled back. To a
place of kindness and cooperation. Where we understood the finality of our situation as we emptied out the place where we shared so much. But we
were going to be kind, share grace. And work together to do the right thing, and make smart decisions. That is why I texted you my high hopes for a
new start.
Is there any possible way, any way at all that we can take one day and just let this rest? Stop the fighting, lay down our arms, and maybe not find
kindness, but at least find civility. There are so many hurt feelings for opportunities lost. But may we please pause for just a moment and take some
time before we make permanent decisions. If you will please, I would love to stand down and resume on Sunday
Sent:01/25/2024 at 11:00 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/26/2024 at 07:18 AM)
Subject:Re: We Can Do This!!!

I am discussing your proposal for how we work with Dr Brown with my lawyer later today and will respond in kind.
Please let me know if Xfinity alerts continue for you.

From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/26/2024 at 07:23 AM)

Message 807 of 4024
I’ve been thinking about this. You made me sign something that says I am a risk to physically beat you or the kids. My queen, my soulmate. My
children. This seems beyond my wildest, worst nightmare. I don’t want to live in a world where I have to sign something like that to stay out of jail. I’
m honestly so lost I don’t know where to begin. It’s all so horrible...
Sent:01/26/2024 at 07:28 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/26/2024 at 08:29 AM)
Subject:Re: We Can Do This!!!
Message 808 of 4024
When have I ever beat you or my children? That’s what it says. Can we please take that part out? I would  end my own life before I beat you or my
children. I spent 29 years dreaming of forever with our crew. I would never beat you or the kids. Do we have to say that I’m going to beat you or Max
and Adrian? It’s so heartbreaking  I can’t stand it.
Sent:01/26/2024 at 07:35 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/26/2024 at 08:29 AM)
Subject:Re: We Can Do This!!!

Max home from school today. Lisa has it covered once I leave.
Have you emailed SAAS re Adrian or plan to? If not I will reach out to Jonathan.
I will complete the the enrollment paperwork for Max which is due soon.

From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/26/2024 at 08:32 AM)

Message 810 of 4024
As mentioned, having Elsa over yesterday was a great help. We made progress unpacking and organizing things. Small progress.
That said, the most important thing was when she was watching me tear the place apart holding my SoberLink case and said “oh, if you need that, I
packed it at the beach. It’s in the black Thule case”
This is the gift from you of course. The problem is, I have not located that Thule case in the tens of boxes and bags I have in the place. It’s really
harder than you might imagine.
I’ll stop everything this AM and just focus on finding that. She was just trying to help, and it is not her fault, it’s mine. I bring it everywhere, and felt
like it was important to have when we saw each other.
Sent:01/26/2024 at 08:32 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/26/2024 at 10:17 AM)
Subject:SoberLink
Attachments:IMG_1066.PNG (274 KB)

But I did not consider that it would be grabbed and stuck in a random box as part of our move. Still, all my fault even if it was just a series of honest,
well meaning, mistakes.
Please let me know if you would like a UA and I’ll be more than happy to accommodate. I will also let you know if I find it or not by end of day so I
can offer next steps for your consideration.
I consider this to be child related, so hope you agree even if it is part of a parenting plan we don’t have. So hope OFW is suitable for this.
Regardless of having nothing mandating this, it is still important to me to demonstrate my commitment to sobriety and assure you that I am always
sober even when I can’t see my kids.
Obviously if we need to address in front of a judge at some point soon, I’m sure Elsa will testify to this, but it is ultimately still my responsibility.
- robert
Message 811 of 4024
I assumed you knew it said that. I’m not trying to argue. I’ll copy and paste it here. I thought it was on purpose?
Is Max sick again? Is something going on. From afar it seems like it is an issue that I’m a little concerned about.
I am happy to reach out too. But we have not had a moment to discuss final messaging and who does what. I’d love to move ahead ASAP.
I asked Lisa if I am allowed to CC you on mails where we need to work on things together yesterday,nbut, as Anna Lisa knows well, she sent all of this
the day before Lisa was scheduled to be out for two weeks.
I am bummed because it is reminiscent of the close of business meeting before a holiday before going dark the week after. It just makes things hard on
you and it seems and we fight. That is unfair to us imho.
I guess in the business world, I would not wait till the night before Chinese New Year to send a critical, large, time consuming request to my
colleagues in Beijing. Anna Lisa should confirm what I said. I made sure she knew of Lisa’s plans two weeks ago.
But I’m not trying to pick a fight. Please don’t take it that way.
I am not sure what the enrollment for Max entails but assume it is just affirmation that he will continue at SAAS.
fwiw- i think I have several relevant docs your should see for tax and estate planning but I think that is a forbidden conversation?

From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/26/2024 at 10:18 AM)
Subject:Re: We Can Do This!!!
Message 812 of 4024
Per your request, please see attached. I
Obviously, it does not say "I beat you," it says I am a "credible threat to the physical safety of you, Max and Adrian" with a history of showing I will do
that and will again. I am not trying to fight this assertion. That would make this situation even worse and be further evidence to be used against me. I
just thought we were focused on digital communications and physical proximity to the house. This feels awful to have to sign and say I agree to. I
Sent:01/26/2024 at 09:23 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/26/2024 at 10:19 AM)
Subject:Re: We Can Do This!!!  <<Will I beat you fork>>
Attachments:Robert_Will_Likely_Beat_Christine_and_His_Chidren.jpg (137 KB)

would never harm you all. Ever...
Per the attached, you and Anna Lisa are saying:
- There is a Serious Concern for Safety: The court believes that there is a legitimate and convincing reason to be concerned for the safety of the
protected person. This is not a speculative or unfounded fear; it's based on credible evidence of similar incidents.
- Physical Safety at Risk: The focus of this statement is on the physical safety of the protected persons. It demonstrates that the court has a real and
demonstrated reason to believe the restrained person will cause physical harm to the persons ordered to be protected.
- Justification for Restraining Order: This finding is the key factor in the court's decision to issue the restraining order. It justifies the need for legal
protection because there is a clear and demonstrated pattern and history of physical abuse from the target of the order.
- Increased Vigilance and Enforcement: With such a clause in place, law enforcement and the court are likely to be more vigilant in enforcing the
order. Violations will be treated with greater seriousness given the perceived risk to physical health and safety of the protected.
- Potential Impact on Other Provisions: This clause will influence other aspects of the restraining order, such as restrictions on proximity,
communication restrictions, and other specific behaviors. The proven threat of bodily harm makes the request highly credible.
- It's important the restrained person and the protected person understand the very serious implications of this clause. The restrained person must be
aware of the seriousness of the situation and the need to strictly adhere to the terms of the order to avoid legal consequences.
- The protected person should understand they are asking for this level of risk mitigation and can demonstrate a history of this behavior so the court
can take all necessary precautions for the physical safety of those being protected given its likelihood of happening again.
Message 813 of 4024
Just to reiterate, I am not trying to physically threaten you or the kids in any way as noted in the RO or with this communication. If you feel quoting
the RO you sent, along with the associated research, is a threat, please let me know immediately.
If so, I promise to address your concerns immediately with my attorney and the court to reassure you, the kids, and the court that I am not
threatening physical or sexual violence now, or ever. Even if you think it is likely to happen in the future.
